[[Image:Deep Den Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Deep Den on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Deep Den''' is a castle in [[the Westerlands]], the region controlled by [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. The castle is located just off the [[Goldroad]] to the east of Casterly Rock, between [[Hornvale]] and [[Silverhill]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/casterly-rock/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Casterly Rock entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Deep Den is the seat of House Lydden.
